articles.title: NRL warned May 28 return date for 2020 season is 'very ambitious' after coronavirus shutdown - ABC News
articles.description: The league wants its competition back up and running next month, but a global sporting group says the NRL has to focus on player safety before the season returns.
articles.content:
Updated 
April 21, 2020 06:51:43
The global body for player unions in sport has cast doubt on whether the NRL can restart its season on May 28, saying the planned return date is "very ambitious".
